title: You're Never Alone...A Child of Divorce Searches for Happiness
description: Sit back and enjoy the incredible journey of a young boy whose parents get divorced, and how he tries desperately to be accepted for who he is and also attempts to be happy once again. Life lessons are all around us, you just have to see them and react accordingly. Along his journey a young boy learns lessons which all men need to know…ones that most women want them to use…such as:Be different, sincere, and make females feel special.Girls remember the good things and want to reciprocate.See the difference in everyone and celebrate it.Girls want to be heard: guys need to be better listeners.But as he applies these lessons, the young boy also learns another lesson: using a good thing the wrong way has its dire consequences.
author: Philip Nork
